gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Nets 115, Pacers 111
gameRecap.excerpt: The Nets defeated the Pacers, 115-111. Cam Thomas led the Nets with 27 points and four rebounds as Noah Clowney (career-highs in PTS (22) and rebounds (10)) and Mikal Bridges (17 points, three 3PM) added 39 for Brooklyn. Pascal Siakam led Indiana with 26 points and nine rebounds as Tyrese Haliburton added 24 points and eight assists. The Nets improve to 30-47 while Indiana falls to 43-34.
